The organization should determine check points and related performance indicators that will be effective and efficient in detecting deviations. 9 Resource management 9.1 General Resources support the operation of all processes in an organization and are critical for ensuring effective and efficient performance and its sustained success. The organization should determine and manage the resources needed for the achievement of its objectives, taking into account the associated risks and opportunities and their potential effects.
